message:
SYSTEM: Master_I_AI_Terminology_in_ontologies_28-10-09%284%29.pdf: Página 21
21
Relations between denomination and concept
• Synonymy: the quality of two or more words with the same 
or similar meaning: 
– contaminación, polución; store, save a file
• Polisemy: the capacity for a word(s) or a sign to have 
multiple meanings. 
–Cluster
• Homonymy: The quality of a word or group of words that 
share the same speling but have different meanings, usually 
because they have different origins. : 
– Tarifa (ciudad), tarifa de precios
– Vino (bebida),  vino (del verbo “venir”)
speaker: SYSTEM
